#### 4.6 Testing Inefficiency of Sports-Bookmakers by Kelly Model

**Dec-2014 to Dec-2014**
: [**Testing Inefficiency of Sports-Bookmakers by Kelly Model**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/kelly-criterion)
  
  - *Apply poisson model to the scrapped data from- **WebDriver Dynamic Webpage Scrapping*- *to build an prediction model.*
  - *Rewrite the Kelly model from- **Odds Modelling and Testing Inefficiency of Sports-Bookmakers*- *in R but also optimal value* $r$ *which is stated in* [*Dixon&Coles1996*](http://www.math.ku.dk/~rolf/teaching/thesis/DixonColes.pdf) *to test the efficiency and the returns of investment based from the Poisson model.*
  - *Improve the efficiency of data management and also timing of calculation.*

```{r roi, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
kellyM <- read.table(file = './data/kellym.txt', header = TRUE) %>% 
  llply(str_replace_all, '\\$|\\%', '') %>% bind_cols %>% 
  mutate(Company = factor(Company), 
         PL.2011.12 = currency(as.numeric(PL.2011.12)), Ratio.2011.12 = percent(Ratio.2011.12) * 0.01, 
         PL2.2011.12 = currency(as.numeric(PL2.2011.12)), Ratio2.2011.12 = percent(Ratio2.2011.12) * 0.01, 
         PL.2012.13 = currency(as.numeric(PL.2012.13)), Ratio.2012.13 = percent(Ratio.2012.13) * 0.01, 
         PL2.2012.13 = currency(as.numeric(PL2.2012.13)), Ratio2.2012.13 = percent(Ratio2.2012.13) * 0.01)

tagList(
  tags$div(align = "center", 
           class = "bg-info", 
           tags$h3(class = "bg-primary", "Return of Investment from Kelly Model"), 
           tags$h5(align = "center", class = "text-muted", 
                   "Breakdown of Operators - Profit & Loss on the Odds Price with/without Overrounds.")), 
  as.htmlwidget(kellyM %>% formattable(list(
    
    PL.2011.12 = color_tile('white', 'darkgoldenrod'), 
    
    Ratio.2011.12 = formatter('span', style = x ~ formattable::style(color = ifelse(rank(-x) <= 3, 'blue', 'grey')), x ~ sprintf('%1.2f%% (rank: %.0f)', 100 * x, rank(-x))), 
    
    PL2.2011.12 = color_tile('white', 'darkgoldenrod'), 
    
    Ratio2.2011.12 = formatter('span', style = x ~ formattable::style(color = ifelse(rank(-x) <= 3, 'blue', 'grey')), x ~ sprintf('%1.2f%% (rank: %.0f)', 100 * x, rank(-x))), 
    
    PL.2012.13 = color_tile('white', 'darkgoldenrod'), 
    
    Ratio.2012.13 = formatter('span', style = x ~ formattable::style(color = ifelse(rank(-x) <= 3, 'blue', 'grey')), x ~ sprintf('%1.2f%% (rank: %.0f)', 100 * x, rank(-x))), 
    
    PL2.2012.13 = color_tile('white', 'darkgoldenrod'), 
    
    Ratio2.2012.13 = formatter('span', style = x ~ formattable::style(color = ifelse(rank(-x) <= 3, 'blue', 'grey')), x ~ sprintf('%1.2f%% (rank: %.0f)', 100 * x, rank(-x)))
    
    ))))
```
